title: Implement read operations in MockCommsClient
description:
Implement the 6 read operations in comms/mock.ts with configurable mock data:

Add private state:
- mockInfo: InfoResponse
- mockActivity: Activity[]
- mockRecords: Map<string, RunRecord>
- mockRunStatus: Map<string, RunStatusResponse>
- mockContexts: Map<string, string>

Add setters: setMockInfo(), setMockActivity(), setMockRecord(), setMockRunStatus(), setMockContext()

Implement the read methods to return mock data.
Add tests to mock.test.ts.
closed_reason: Implemented 6 read operations in MockCommsClient with configurable mock data, 76 tests passing
